exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros. split. - intros H. apply nat_meet_right in H. apply binary_le_inv in H as [H | [H1 H2]]. + apply lb_mask_equiv_equal. apply Znat.Nat2Z.inj_iff in H. rewrite H. reflexivity. + apply Nat.mul_id_r in H1; try lia. apply lb_mask_equiv_equal. apply Znat.Nat2Z.inj_iff in H1. rewrite H1. reflexivity. - intros H. apply lb_mask_eq_binary_le in H. apply nat_meet_left in H. apply lb_mask_equiv_equal. apply Znat.Nat2Z.inj_iff. apply Nat_eq.dne. intros H'. apply H. apply Znat.Nat2Z.inj_iff. apply H'.
